app.title: PKU Tools
app.description: Free tools and apps for people with PKU.

home.title: Home
home.translation: German translation is still in progress.

phe-log.title: Phe Log
phe-log.description: This is an early version of the tool and is still being tweaked.

amino-counter.title: Amino Counter
amino-counter.description: Count the daily intake of the amino acid mixture (short AS).

other-apps.title: Other Apps
other-apps.phe-rechner: German PKU app that combines calculator, pen, paper and nutrition table (~ 2017).
other-apps.pku-manager: English PKU app for searching, calculating and tracking food (~ 2018).
other-apps.simple-nutrition-calculator: General app for calculating any nutrient values (~ 2019).

about.title: About
about.install: This app can be installed on any device by adding it to the homescreen.
about.author: Author
about.sources: Sources: Common food from the USDA National Nutrient Database
